name: Space Slime
description:
Do you want to shoot some slime in space? Then this game is for you. This is a game that has a funny shoot'em up style game play. Your goal is to kill evil slime and save the good slime. Please leave  comment with  your opinion on the game and why.  go to evilspaceslime.com

How To Play:

shoot the red and pink slime. eat the yellow slime.

wasd to move. spacebar to shoot.

MINIMUM system requirements:

-AMD athlon x2

-4GB of RAM

-Windows 7 or newer

-needs at least 1GB of storage

For support email: support@evilspaceslime.com
